summary.HiringOrgName: JET SPORT TEXTILTRYK V/CLAUS BO MØRK

WorkPlace.Name: JET SPORT TEXTILTRYK V/CLAUS BO MØRK

HiringOrg.Name: JET SPORT TEXTILTRYK V/CLAUS BO MØRK

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
About Jet Sport
Jet Sport is Denmark’s leading textile printer. We are a family-owned B2B company with strong values that manifest a dedicated but friendly and accommodating work culture.

We hail from Viborg, Denmark, from where our approximately 130 employees deliver prints and embroidery for football clubs, sporting goods stores, workwear clothing companies, and industrial launderers. Our logos adorn the Denmark national football team’s and many Superliga clubs’ kits while we also partner with many Danish hospitals and all leading Nordic industrial launderers.

Our staff is a young, forward-thinking team of entrepreneurs, printers, and graphic designers with ambitions of continued development and growth. As a consequence of our success and increased market shares, we operate with an ever-growing international outlook and are on the hunt for skilled graphic designers to join us on our journey. Are you an experienced DTP artist with an eye for graphic organization, file separation, and production for serigraph printing, you may be among them.

Tasks
A high degree of independent work will mainly consist of:

  • • Layout of logos for serigraph printing.
  • • Overprinting and separation.
  • • Vector graphic creation (clean-up)
  • • HP Indigo management and production of matching printing files. 

Your qualifications

  • You are a dedicated DTP artist capable of supporting our production in an oftentimes hectic environment.
  • You remain focused on the tasks at hand while providing competent and useful customer support.
  • You have provable experience from a similar position with another printing company.
  • You are an expert user of Illustrator.
  • In busy environments, you remain patient, staying above the fray.
  • Your ambitions inspire you to keep learning and working hard.
  • You are preferably familiar with Navision and have previous experience working with serigraph printing.

What you get
We give you pleasantly busy workdays in an accommodating environment with a flat hierarchy. You may freely arrange your work schedule between the hours of 06.00 and 24.00.

How you apply
Send your application, grades, and other relevant material to job@jetsport.dk. Write ”DTP artist” in the subject line. 

We look forward to hearing from you.
